alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; Jackson; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 2:56AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Jackson, northwestern Bay, southern Walton, central Holmes and Washington Counties through 330 AM EDT/230 AM CDT/... At 255 AM EDT/155 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Bonifay to 9 miles southeast of De Funiak Springs to 7 miles southwest of Destin. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City Beach, Vernon, Chipley, Santa Rosa Beach, Bonifay, Marianna, Eglin Air Force Base, Bradford, Live Oak, Freeport, Cottondale, Ponce De Leon, Alford, Caryville, Wausau, Westville, Ebro, Whitehead Crossroads, Blue Mountain Beach and Gritney. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; Jackson; South Walton; Washington
